word:
Is Man to be a Dictator? 

                                 Sanitarium, Cal., May 26, 1908. 

To the Officers of the General Conference, 
                Washington, D. C. 

Dear Brethren:-- 
     I have read a very encouraging letter from Prof. P. T. Magan to Prof. E. A. Sutherland regarding the recent council held in Washington. I am very thankful for the good report it brings regarding the council.
